name: Chasse au Trésor
description:
A Game By: Aardvark Pirates

"Chasse au Trésor" or "Teasure Hunt" in English is a stealth experience wherein you take the role of the infamous thief named Treasure Hunt.  Your mission, should you choose to accept it is to steal a painting from this french gallery. Navigate your way through all while avoiding the security and inspect each painting to find the one created by famous painter Michael Bublé. 

Get in, get the job done, and slip out right under their noses. Your reputation depends on it.


Student project developed at the University of Central Florida.
